<description>Part 1: Three-dimensional rectangular prism with a central circular hole Construct a three-dimensional, rectangular prism with a central circular hole. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Create a 2D sketch on the XY plane and draw a square shape with the following points: * Line 1 (0.0, 0.0) to (0.75, 0.0) * Line 2 (0.75, 0.0) to (0.75, 0.75) * Line 3 (0.75, 0.75) to (0.0, 0.75) * Line 4 (0.0, 0.75) to (0.0, 0.0) Close the loop and scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch with the given coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch along the Z-axis with a depth of 0.75 units to create the three-dimensional shape. Next, create a new coordinate system for the central circular hole. Use the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.375, 0.375, 0.375] Create a 2D sketch on the XY plane and draw a circle with the following center and radius: * Center: [0.225, 0.225] * Radius: 0.225 Close the loop and scale the sketch by a factor of 0.45. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch with the new coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch along the Z-axis with a depth of 0.375 units in the opposite direction of the normal to create the circular hole. This part has the following dimensions: * Length: 0.75 * Width: 0.75 * Height: 0.75 Part 2: Cylindrical object with a tapered top and bottom Construct a cylindrical object with a slightly tapered top and bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.15, 0.15, 0.75] Create a 2D sketch on the XY plane and draw a circle with the following center and radius: * Center: [0.225, 0.225] * Radius: 0.225 Close the loop and extrude the 2D sketch along the Z-axis with a depth of 0.375 units in the opposite direction of the normal. Scale the resulting solid cylinder by a factor of 0.45. Extrude the scaled cylinder along the Z-axis with a depth of 0.375 units to create the tapered shape. This part has the following dimensions: * Length: 0.45 * Width: 0.45 * Height: 0.375</description>
